In accordance with the GHG Protocol for Project Accounting, a project is ‘A specific activity or set
of activities intended to reduce GHG emissions, increase the storage of carbon, or enhance GHG
removals from the atmosphere. A GHG project may be a stand-alone project, or a component of
a larger non-GHG project.’
